name: Game of rewind
description:
In Game of rewind, the world is simulated by conway's game of life, and the player can both fast forward and rewind time.

This ended up as more of a proof of concept due to not having enough time to do level design, however i really liked the idea of this, and using conway's game of life to do puzzles.

I livestreamed the development at https://www.twitch.tv/teevik/videos?filter=archives&sort=time

Credits

Music - https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata

Jump sound - https://opengameart.org/content/jump-landing-sound
